wikipedia_page.main: John Trevor Thompson (21 May 1955 – December 2021) was an English professional footballer who played as a full-back. Active in England and the United States, Thompson made over 150 career league appearances.

response: * Trevor Thompson (footballer, born 1936), Northern Irish footballer
